bill.title: Tax collectors and assessor-collectors; revise provisions regarding travel expenses and examination fees.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-1-51, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Requirement That The Board Of Supervisors Preapprove Travel By Tax Collectors, Assessor-tax Collectors And Their Deputies To An Approved Certified Collection School, And To Require Expenses Associated With Attendance At The School To Be Charged Against The Tax Collector's Or Assessor-tax Collector's Budget; To Amend Section 27-1-69, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Delete The Exemption From Paying An Examination Fee For Tax Collectors And Assessor-tax Collectors Taking Certain Examinations For The First Time, And To Abolish The Tax Collector Training Fund; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To County Affairs;Fees and Salaries of Public Officers
